# Useful Shalek lab links
KCO galaxy server- http://kcoserver.broadinstitute.org:8088/

Reimbursements - https://atlas.mit.edu/atlas/Main.action?tab=home -> under the ‘home’ tab click ‘my reimbursements' . If reimbursements are for food for a meeting, include the names and affiliations of each person who attended. You cannot reimburse tax, but you can reimburse tip. MIT's tax exempt form is in the dropbox. You should send these to Magdalah Wesh.

Travel reimbursements - concur.mit.edu 

Shalek lab github - https://github.com/shaleklab 

Filing service/facilities requests - go on Atlas (atlas.mit.edu)  --> Service request
